transitions.name: Linear Wipe
transitions.short_description: Reveals content via a moving edge.
transitions.long_description: Uses a clipping mask to reveal or hide content along a straight line (Horizontal or Vertical).

transitions.name: Clock Wipe
transitions.short_description: Reveals content in a circular motion.
transitions.long_description: A 360-degree radial sweep that masks the element in or out.
